parameters.name: query_times
parameters.label: Time Interval
parameters.description: Time range for detection Start Times

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "ExtraHop"
| extend detectionID = DeviceCustomNumber1
| extend StartTime = extract("start=([0-9-]+T[0-9:.]+Z)", 1, AdditionalExtensions,typeof(datetime))
| summarize arg_min(todatetime(ReceiptTime), *) by detectionID
| summarize count(detectionID) by Activity, bin(make_datetime(ReceiptTime), 1h)
content.title: Detections by Recently Updated

content.query:
let category_map = dynamic(
{
    "sec.action" : "Actions on Objective",
    "sec.caution": "Caution",
    "sec.command": "Command and Control",
    "sec.exploit": "Exploitation",
    "sec.lateral": "Lateral Movement",
    "sec.recon": "Reconnaissance"
    }
);
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "ExtraHop"
| extend categories = iif(DeviceCustomString2 != "", split(DeviceCustomString2, ","),dynamic(null))
| extend detectionID = DeviceCustomNumber1
| project detectionID, updateTime=todatetime(ReceiptTime), categories
| summarize arg_max(updateTime, *) by detectionID
| sort by detectionID desc 
| where isnotnull(categories)
| mv-expand cat=categories to typeof(string) 
| summarize count() by cat
| project Category=tostring(category_map[cat]), Count=count_
| where Category != ""
content.title: Detections by Category
Top Participants

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
    | where DeviceVendor == "ExtraHop"
    | extend StartTime = extract("start=([0-9-]+T[0-9:.]+Z)", 1, AdditionalExtensions,typeof(datetime))
    | extend detectionID = DeviceCustomNumber1
    | summarize arg_max(todatetime(StartTime), *) by detectionID
    | summarize Count=count() by Activity
    | sort by Count desc, Activity asc
    | project-rename ["Detection Title"]=Activity
content.title: Top Detections by Title

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "ExtraHop"
| summarize arg_max(ReceiptTime, *) by DeviceCustomNumber1 // detection ID
| sort by DeviceCustomNumber2 // risk score
| project ["Risk Score"] = DeviceCustomNumber2,
Title=Activity, 
SourceIP,
DestinationIP,
["Last Updated"]=format_datetime(make_datetime(ReceiptTime), 'M/d/yyyy HH:mm:ss'),
ID=DeviceCustomNumber1,
URI=DeviceCustomString1
| take 10
content.title: Top Ten Detections by Highest Risk Score
